title: ESS飞行权限问题
author: Onism_
txt_content: 我给了用户组飞行的权限，为什么还是不能飞，提示的是已经打开了飞行模式，但按两下空格还是飞不起来

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
Muzi_Q 发表于 2020-3-18 17:31
出毛病了，再输入fly的提示还是已开启飞行
更新下ess的版本试试
[综合|经济|传送|管理][少更新]Essentials EssentialsX —— 基础插件[1.7.10-1.14]
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-619883-1-1.html

replies.author: Onism_
replies.txt_content:
素衣颜如初 发表于 2020-3-18 16:31
/fly  有权利吗
有的，，，，

请查看一下你的权限组
我估计是你给错权限组了，有好几个权限你可以先看一眼玩家的权限在加一次权限试试

replies.author: Onism_
replies.txt_content:
7783 发表于 2020-3-18 16:42
请查看一下你的权限组
我估计是你给错权限组了，有好几个权限你可以先看一眼玩家的权限在加一次权限试试 ...
我设置的是单独地皮世界飞行，权限组如下
  Default:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - cheastcommand.open.example.yml
    - cheastcommands.open.example.yml
    - chestcommands.command.open
    - chestcommands.open.exampel,yml
    - chestcommands.open.exampel.yml
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - chestcommands.open.Untitled-1.yml
    - chestcommands.open.zl.yml
    - Essential.command.fly
    - essentials.build.*
    - essentials.delhome
    - essentials.fly
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.kit.tools
    - essentials.kits.mrlb
    - essentials.kits.tolss
    - essentials.kits.tools
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.plots.deny.*
    - essentials.plots.permpack.basic
    - essentials.plots.permpack.basicinbox
    - essentials.plots.plot.1
    - essentials.plots.use
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tphere
    - essentials.warp
    - plots.deny.*
    - plots.permpack.basic
    - plots.permpack.basicinbox
    - plots.plot.1
    - plots.use
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
